TEXT.S: Piyuma i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Piyuma. u kasalumaluma' nu Piyuma sa, 168 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 716 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 702 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 14 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 3%.
